summary: My passion is to inspire class members to get fit & stay fit. I believe that Yoga is a key element of fitness along with strength & cardio training that leads to a long & happy fulfilled life. My classes are fun, yet challenging and engaging that encourage all participants to feel good about themselves and come back for more.
skills: AFAA Group Exercise Boot Camp Training
